sentences.sContent: the widening gap between the rich and the poor
...people queued to see the gap where the "Mona Lisa" had once hung in a way they had never done for the painting itself...
...but at least it has a smaller gap between the outcomes for first-generation students and those of their peers...
...not merely because it doesn't look good to have a large gap between the rich and the poor...
...hadn't identified what that gap in perception was derived from...
...and its efforts to conquer the gender gap impart a vital lesson-though not the lesson the Swedes had in mind...
...the World Economic Forum found that when it comes to closing the gender gap in economic participation and opportunity...
...there is a considerable gap between leading-edge companies and the rest of the pack...
...and the gap grows larger over time...
...the gap has been roughly halved over the last three years...
...had a 19-point gap in 2007 and a 22-point gap in 2006...
...and Princeton – show almost no gap between black and white graduation rates...
...and Princeton show almost no gap between black and white graduation rates mainly because   ...
...the gap between the earnings of college and high-school graduates narrowed...
...There’s an enormous gap between the rich and the poor in this country...
